tool.name: OGS: AssignRasterDataToMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'AssignRasterDataToMesh'.
tool.command: if [ "$raster" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$raster.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$raster' '${$raster.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$input" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input' '${$input.element_identifier}'; fi; AssignRasterDataToMesh #if str($nodata).strip() != 'None' and str($nodata).strip() != '': --nodata '$nodata' #end if $cell_array $node_array --scalar-name '$scalar_name' --raster '$raster.element_identifier' --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.vtu

param.name: nodata
param.label: nodata
param.help: The no data value used for missing values (min = 0)

param.name: cell_array
param.label: cell array
param.help: Assigns raster data to cell array

param.name: node_array
param.label: node array
param.help: Assigns raster data to node array (default)

tool.help: This tool runs the **AssignRasterDataToMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
